basics.name: Erhan Huang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii.

work.summary: Collaborated with a team of 5 to build a web application for students to buy, sell, or trade items using modern full-stack technologies.
highlights: Implemented the Explore page with dynamic item filtering and database integration using Prisma and PostgreSQL.
Built the Favorites system with API routes to persist favorite items by authenticated users.
Used Next.js, TypeScript, and React-Bootstrap to develop responsive and modular UI components.
Improved user experience by adding modal popups and optimizing item detail rendering.
